Package org.hust.controller

Class RentBikeController

java.lang.Object
org.hust.controller.BaseController
org.hust.controller.RentBikeController
public class RentBikeController
extends BaseController
Controller for rent bike use case.

    • requestToRentBike

      public void requestToRentBike​(java.lang.String barcode) throws InvalidBarcodeException
      Request to rent bike, which will call the rent bike confirm screen to show the bike's info and wait for user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      barcode - - barcode of the bike that is requested to be rent
      Throws:
      InvalidBarcodeException - - if there are no bike with the corresponding barcode

    • requestToRentBike

      public void requestToRentBike​(Bike bike) throws AlreadyRentBikeException
      Request to rent bike, which will call the rent bike confirm screen to show the bike's info and wait for user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      bike - - the bike that is requested to be rent
      Throws:
      AlreadyRentBikeException - if the bike is already rent

    • rentBike

      public void rentBike​(Bike bike) throws AlreadyRentBikeException
      Process to make payment transaction and rent bike, this should only be called from RentBikeConfirmPopup
      Parameters:
      bike - - bike to be rent
      Throws:
      AlreadyRentBikeException - if the bike is already rent

    • validateBarcode

      public boolean validateBarcode​(java.lang.String barcode)
      Validate the format of user's input barcode.
      Parameters:
      barcode - - user's input barcode
      Returns:
      true - if the barcode is in correct format false - if otherwise
